item.description: Working Papers “Mandatory vs. Voluntary Disclosure in the Dynamic Market for Lemons,” 2024 (with Cyrus Aghamolla) [SSRN], R&R at Review of Financial Studies [expand] We consider a dynamic adverse selection setting where a privately informed seller can choose to reveal or withhold past trade information to privately informed buyers.
